name: Harris Tweed Scottie Dog (Large and Medium)
description:
Cute and cheerful, Harris Tweed 'scottie' dogs - will add a bit of Hebridean cheer to any room, and would make a lovely, fun gift.

Available in medium and large sizes, I will make your 'scottie' dog to-order.  Please allow up to 10 days from ordering for me to make and despatch your 'scottie' :)

My 'Scottie'  dogs are made in lovely herringbone Harris Tweed, have a sweet tartan ribbon feature and hand-embroidered eyes.  Filled with soft-polyester fibre.  Unique Tweed Delights design.

Approx Size:
Large Scottie - 13 inches, from nose to tail  (£17.50)

Medium Scottie - 10 inches, from nose to tail  (£12.50)

Please choose size required from drop down menu.

Handmade  with love and  care in my home in the Outer Hebrides. x

UK postage - £3.00
International postage - £5.00

name: Harris Tweed Colour-Block Washbag
description:
Fun and funky Harris Tweed colour-block wash-bag, using 4 different panels  of Harris Tweed.

Your wash-bag will be made-to-order - please  allow up to 14 days for despatch.  Each wash-bag will feature two plaid blocks and  two self-colour blocks, features a peacock blue waterproof fabric lining.

Approx size:  12 inches x 8 inches.

Please note that colours used will depend on whatever stocks of tweed I currently have in stock.  Reverse  of bag will be charcoal grey herringbone tweed.

Handmade with love and care in my home in the Outer Hebrides of Scotland.

Please select from 'brights/plaid' mix (example as shown) or choose 'earthy/neutrals' mix for a more unisex colour tone (would also make a nice 'manly' gift in slightly more muted colours!)

UK postage - £3.00
International postage - £5.00

name: Harris Tweed Colour-Block Scarf
description:
Luxurious Harris Tweed scarf in colour-block/patchwork design with cosy fleece lining.

Scarf measures approx. 41 inches x 8 inches

Available in black/grey mix or brown/earthy mix.

Please note that I make my colour block scarves with whatever tweed stocks I currently have so scarves will not look exactly the same as the one shown.   They will all be a little bit different!  Photo is an example only - all scarves will feature a mix of herringbone, plaid, self-colour blocks, however :)

Please choose from black/grey mix or brown/earthy mix from menu.  Please  allow up to 14 days for me to make your colour-block scarf.

Handmade with care in my home in the Outer Hebrides of Scotland x

UK postage - £3.00
International postage - £5.00

name: Hebridean Matryoshka (Russian Doll) Button Design
description:
Harris Tweed Matryoshka (Russian Doll).  This item is made-to-order and will take approximately 10-14 days for me to make your very own unique Matryoshka Doll.

Made in lovely luxurious Harris Tweed, I have used oddments of my stash of designer fabrics to add details such as doll's headscarf, etc.  Please note that your doll will be unique and the colours may not be exactly as shown.  

Exclusive Tweed Delights - I individually hand-embroidered every doll's face with care.   Harris Tweed woven label on front panel as shown.

Would make a lovely decorative  feature - this item is NOT suitable for small children due to the button feature.

Approx size:  12 inches in height, 8 inches width (at widest point).

Made with love and care in my home in the Outer Hebrides of Scotland - the heartland of Harris Tweed :)

UK Postage:  £3.00
International postage:  £6.00

name: Harris Tweed Mug Cosy/Warmer
description:
Cute and quirky gift idea - give your mug a hug with one of my cosy Harris Tweed mug warmers.  You know you need one, hehe :)

Made to my own design, the mug-cosy features a lovely wooden button and loop feature with added loop to prevent any slipping.  (Mug NOT included)

Would make a nice, lightweight gift to send to a friend - nicely packaged with simple instructions on how to attach your cosy to your favourite mug.    

Enjoy your favourite beverage in true Hebridean style :)  Available in plaid tweeds - sorry I cannot specify which you will receive!

Handcrafted with love and care in my home in the Outer Hebrides of Scotland - the heartland of Harris Tweed!

Made-to-order - despatched within 10 days.

UK shipping - £1.50
International shipping - £2.00
